verses.name: Genesis 23:6
verses.text: Hear us, my lord: thou art a mighty prince among us: in the choice of our sepulchres bury thy dead; none of us shall withhold from thee his sepulchre, but that thou mayest bury thy dead.

verses.name: Genesis 23:7
verses.text: And Abraham stood up, and bowed himself to the people of the land, even to the children of Heth.

verses.name: Genesis 23:8
verses.text: And he communed with them, saying, If it be your mind that I should bury my dead out of my sight; hear me, and intreat for me to Ephron the son of Zohar,
